CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 提高；举起；增加；抬高；使升高；增强；提升（声音）；提及；提出；建立；树立；直立；使站立；筹集；筹款；募集；饲养；抚养；种植；养育；培养；造成；引起；启动；动员；召集；唤醒；激励；鼓舞；取消；撤销；终止；解除；在（另一玩牌人）基础上加注
<美>加薪；（扑克牌或勃莱格牌用语）赌注加码；加叫；（举重持杠铃时的）提；举

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 提高（raise的过去时和过去分词）；举起

word_mean_info__list.difference: 书面用词，多用于诗歌或比喻中，具有特殊的修辞色彩。
及物动词，常用词，多指把某物从低处升到高处，有时作引申用。
普通用词，指具体的或抽象的事物由低向高移动。
语气比raise强，指用体力或机械的力举起或抬起某物。
较正式用词，指位置、高度的升高，多作比喻用，指职位、品德等的提高。
较正式用词，常可与lift换用，但强调把某物举起或抬起到应有的高度。常用比喻。
多指用绳索、滑轮等机械把重物升起。
指需花大力气或借外力才能举起或抬起重物。
指用人力或机械力把某物升到较高的位置。
原义指从后面或下面推起或提高，现常用于指提高价格、振作精神等抽象概念。

word_group.brief_definition: 筹钱；筹集资金；筹集款项
募捐；筹备资金；筹集资金
喧闹不休, 闹翻了天, 吵翻了天
愤怒抗议, (尤指)大吵大闹

bilingual.source: Please raise your arms as you inhale.
This lift can raise very heavy items.
bilingual.target: 这台起重机可以举起非常重的东西。

bilingual.source: Let's raise our glasses for a toasting to the newlyweds.
bilingual.target: 让我们举起酒杯为新婚夫妇敬酒。

bilingual.source: The police officer drew his pistol and ordered the suspect to raise his hands.
bilingual.target: 警察拔出手枪，命令嫌疑人举起双手。
下垂的手再一次举起来

bilingual.source: Land in Dorne and raise my banners.
bilingual.target: 以多恩为据点举起旗帜。

bilingual.source: Boys and girls, please raise you hand
bilingual.target: 男孩和女孩,请举起你的手

bilingual.source: What kind of man raise things without lifting them?
bilingual.target: 哪种人喂养东西而不用举起他们？

bilingual.source: One, at last, had the courage to raise a hand.
bilingual.target: 但毕竟有一个学生鼓起勇气举起了手。

list.abstract: 英文单词。n.上升,高地,增高,提出vt.升起,举起,唤起,提高,使出现,使复活,提出,筹集；养育v.提出（问题）。征集，募集也作为Err参数。

yingyinNormal.en: Whatever happened to the man who was trying to raise a submarine?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个试图举起潜水艇的人怎么了？

yingyinNormal.en: Join the locals by the water, raise your ice cold beer, and make a toast to paradise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来到海边融入当地人的世界，举起手中冰凉的啤酒，齐齐为这个天堂干杯。

yingyinNormal.en: Raise you arms. Imagine that you are beautiful swans. And what noise do you think a swan might make?
yingyinNormal.zh: 请把双手举起来，想象你们是只漂亮的天鹅。小朋友们，你们觉得天鹅的声音什么样的呢？

yingyinNormal.en: How would you raise them?
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么养育它们？

yingyinNormal.en: Joe, emus are birds. You raise them for meat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔伊，鸸鸟是鸟类，是养来当食物的。

yingyinNormal.en: Dr. Pym? You don't need to raise your hand, Scott.
yingyinNormal.zh: 呃...皮姆博士？你不用举手的，斯科特。

yingyinNormal.en: But these two together, they raise each other's game.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这俩人一起，她们提高了对方的水平。

yingyinNormal.en: More companies are choosing to raise their workers' wages.
yingyinNormal.zh: 更多的企业正在选择提高他们员工的工资。

yingyinNormal.en: George, raise the flag. George, raise the flag. Peppa, ring the bell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治，把旗子升起来。乔治，把旗子升起来。佩奇，敲响铃铛。

yingyinNormal.en: I got a real problem here. I could raise my level. But I know if I do, it'll only make her raise her level, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我现在真的碰上大麻烦了，我可以提高我的水平，但我知道如果我这样做，只会刺激她也提高她的水平。

yingyinNormal.en: Mommy's going to buy shoes. I did not raise a rat!
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈咪要去买鞋子。我可没养一个叛徒！

yingyinNormal.en: I hate to pile on the bad news, but I just got a raise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道，不该再告诉你们一个坏消息，但我加薪了。

yingyinNormal.en: And one of the best would be to raise the minimum wage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其中最好的一个办法将是提高最低工资标准。

yingyinNormal.en: We did raise the roof that night. Yeah, we totally did.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那晚我们的确是嗨爆了全场。绝对啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Did somebody miss me? Was there a child to raise poorly?
yingyinNormal.zh: 有人想念我吗？有婴儿需要被无能的父亲抚养长大吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You knew going in that I wanted to raise our child as a clown.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你非常了解我希望把我们的孩子培养成一个小丑。

yingyinNormal.en: That's why since the first time I asked Congress to give America a raise, 13 states, 21 cities and D.C. have gone around Congress to raise their workers' wages.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也因此自我首次要求国会给美国提高工资的机会开始，13个州,21个城市以及哥伦比亚特区已经绕过国会提高了他们那里工人的工资。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, Haley didn't run a 10K yesterday to raise awareness for alopecia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 海莉昨天没跑十公里去为秃头症患者争取关注。

yingyinNormal.en: She's pregnant with my child. And she and Susan are going to raise the baby.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她怀了我的孩子，并打算和苏珊共同扶养。

yingyinNormal.en: Raise your hand if you had a flying psycho ninja copier try to kill you today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要是你今天遇到了一个会飞的变态复印机忍者杀手，请举手。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 抬起; 举起; 使直立

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 募捐；筹备资金；筹集资金

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: vt. 筹集；升起；建造；举起；饲养；（raise的过去式和过去分词）
vt. 筹集；升起；建造；举起；饲养；（raise的现在分词）

word_family.mean: v. 举起；把…往上提；使升高；提高；增大；使被听见；使被考虑；使得到讨论；筹集；募集；养育；教养；使复活；解除；把…从窝里赶出；刺激…生成

sense_info_list.en: increase the amount, level, or strength of

examination_example.sentence: But another, related force — a policy often buried deep in course catalogs called "grade forgiveness" — is helping <highlight>raise</highlight> GPAs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是另一种相关力量——一种经常被深埋在课程目录中被称为“分数宽恕”的政策，正在帮助提高平均绩点。

examination_example.sentence: I would <highlight>raise</highlight> prices and make it into more of a legacy product.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我会提高价格，让它成为更加传统的产品。

examination_example.sentence: This is a shame — the community should be grasping the opportunity to <highlight>raise</highlight> its influence in the real world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一种耻辱——社区应该抓住机会，提高自己在现实世界中的影响力。

sense_info_list.en: put forward for consideration or discussion

examination_example.sentence: Today the rapid growth of artificial intelligence (AI) <highlight>raises</highlight> fundamental questions: "What is intelligence, identity, or consciousness? What makes humans humans? "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，人工智能的迅速发展引出了一些根本性的问题：“什么是智能、身份或意识？什么使人类成为人类？”

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Raise</highlight> objections and listen carefully to their replies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提出异议并认真听取他们的回答。

examination_example.sentence: This and other similar cases <highlight>raise</highlight> the question of whether there is still a line between the court and politics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一案件和其他类似案件提出了一个问题，即法院和政治之间是否仍有界限。

examination_example.sentence: The industry is betting that the same consumers paying more for premium attributes such as free-range, non-GMO, and pasture-<highlight>raised</highlight> eggs will embrace sustainability.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该行业认为，同样的消费者会为自由放养、非转基因和牧场饲养的鸡蛋等优质产品支付更多的钱，他们也会支持可持续发展的模式。

examination_example.sentence: There, as people got more money, some of them may have more cleared land for cattle to <highlight>raise</highlight> for meat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那里，随着人们挣到更多的钱，他们中的一些人可能会有更多的空地来养牛吃肉。

examination_example.sentence: It gives us patience for ourselves and toward others as well as patience while driving, catching a fish, or <highlight>raising</highlight> a child.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它(心理健康)给了我们对自己和他人的耐心，也给了我们在开车、抓鱼或抚养孩子时的耐心。

sense_info_list.en: collect, levy, or bring together money or resources

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Raise</highlight> more funds for fire-prone areas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为火灾多发地区筹集更多资金。

examination_example.sentence: Promise to <highlight>raise</highlight> funds for USFWS operations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 承诺为美国鱼类及野生动物管理局的运作筹集资金。

sense_info_list.en: call forth emotions, feelings, and responses

examination_example.sentence: Involves some concerns <highlight>raised</highlight> by AI today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 涉及当今人工智能（AI）引发的一些担忧。

examination_example.sentence: Electronic means of payment may <highlight>raise</highlight> security and privacy concerns.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电子支付方式可能会引起安全和隐私问题。

sense_info_list.en: lift or move to a higher position or level
sense_info_list.zh: 抬起; 举起; 使直立

sense_info_list.en: construct or build a structure
promote someone to a higher rank
multiply a quantity by itself to a specified power
establish radio communications with
to end a restriction on sb/sth
bring someone back from death

word_usage.usage: raise为及物动词，必须接宾语，而rise为不及物动词，不接宾语。raise表示举起、提起、提升、增加；表示人或物从低处向高处上升以及数字上升或数量增加用rise。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 抬起; 举起; 使直立

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: increase the amount, level, or strength of
collect, levy, or bring together money or resources

examination_example.sentence: Other rocket enthusiasts also <highlight>raised</highlight> funds for him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他火箭爱好者也为他筹集了资金。

examination_example.sentence: More than €650 million was <highlight>raised</highlight> in a few hours on Tuesday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 周二，在几个小时内就筹集了超过6.5亿欧元。

examination_example.sentence: Such levies are no universal remedy as the amounts <highlight>raised</highlight> would be tiny compared with what has been taken away by central government since 2010.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这类税收并不是万能的，因为与2010年以来中央政府征收的税收相比，征收的金额微不足道。

examination_example.sentence: What may prevent parents from <highlight>raising</highlight> confident and capable children?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 什么可能会阻止父母培养自信和有能力的孩子？

examination_example.sentence: Soon after launching E Pic's most successful product-the Bison Bacon Cranberry Bar-Collinsand Forrest found they'd exhausted their sources for bison (北美野牛) <highlight>raised</highlight> exclusively on pasture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在推出EPIC最成功的产品 Bison Bacon Cranberry Bar(北美野牛培根蔓越莓棒)之后不久，Collins 和 Forrest 发现他们已经用尽了仅在牧场上饲养的北美野牛资源。

examination_example.sentence: Young bison will be <highlight>raised</highlight> according to its grass-fed protocols, with a guaranteed purchase price.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 年轻的野牛将根据其草食协议饲养，购买价格有保证。

sense_info_list.en: call forth emotions, feelings, and responses

examination_example.sentence: Talking about a previous job negatively <highlight>raises</highlight> concerns.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 消极地谈论以前的工作会引起担忧。

examination_example.sentence: System institutions are operating very efficiently based on this analysis, <highlight>raising</highlight> the question of the value of pursuing a broad scale outsourcing initiative.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基于这一分析，董事系统机构运作得非常有效率，这引发了推行大规模外包计划的价值问题。

sense_info_list.en: put forward for consideration or discussion

examination_example.sentence: In fact, when Twinge previously used this data to suggest a screen time effect, some commentators were quick to <highlight>raise</highlight> this problem.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实际上，当 Twinge 以前使用此数据来暗示屏幕时间的影响时，一些评论员很快就提出了这个问题。

sense_info_list.en: lift or move to a higher position or level
sense_info_list.zh: 抬起; 举起; 使直立

sense_info_list.en: an increase in salary

word_usage.usage:
raise和rise都可表示“由低向上升高的动作或趋势”，但raise是及物动词，在主动句中其后必须有宾语; rise是不及物动词，后面不直接跟宾语。如：
他举手提问。
误 He rose his hand to ask a question.
正 He raised his hand to ask a question.
raise作动词时有“提高”的意思，但是“提高英语   ”一般用 improve one's English表达，raise one's English 是逐字直译的中式英语。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 抬起; 举起; 使直立

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: increase the amount; level; or strength of

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>raised</highlight> public awareness of the possible causes of heart disease.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们提高了公众对造成心脏病可能原因的认识。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Raise</highlight> public awareness of environmental pollution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提高公众对环境污染的认识。

examination_example.sentence: The orange warning may be <highlight>raised</highlight> to red in some areas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 橙色预警在一些地区可能会被提升到红色预警。

sense_info_list.en: collect; levy; or bring together money or resources

examination_example.sentence: To date, his online page has <highlight>raised</highlight> more than $17,000 in just one day, with the help of many famous actors and others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，在许多著名演员和其他人的帮助下，他的在线筹款页面仅一天就筹集了1.7万美元。

examination_example.sentence: To date, his online page to <highlight>raise</highlight> funds has brought in more than $44,000 and counting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，他的筹款网页已经筹集了超过4.4万美元，而且还在增加。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>raised</highlight> ducks and geese for their eggs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们养鸭子和鹅来下蛋。

examination_example.sentence: If parents disapprove of how their daughter is <highlight>raising</highlight> their grandchildren, chances are that they are not going to enjoy her visits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果父母不赞成女儿抚养孙子孙女的方式，那么他们很可能不会喜欢女儿的来访。

sense_info_list.en: put forward for consideration or discussion

examination_example.sentence: The International Union for Conservation of Nature has <highlight>raised</highlight> concerns after the poisonous fish was spotted in the waters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在水中发现有毒鱼后，国际自然保护联盟对此表示担忧。

examination_example.sentence: Only one representative, Jad Tabet from Lebanon, tried to <highlight>raise</highlight> the issue.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有黎巴嫩的一名代表 Jad Tabet 试图提出这个问题。

sense_info_list.en: call forth emotions; feelings; and responses

examination_example.sentence: That such mobility has become more difficult in San Jose <highlight>raises</highlight> questions about: the endurance of that foundational belief.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在圣何塞，这种流动性变得更加困难，这引发了一个问题：这种基本信念的持久性。

sense_info_list.en: an increase in salary

examination_example.sentence: And even if I get a promotion, I'm not guaranteed to get a <highlight>raise</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且，即使我升职了，也不一定能加薪。

sense_info_list.en: lift or move to a higher position or level
sense_info_list.zh: 抬起; 举起; 使直立

sense_info_list.en: bring a surface or a design into relief and cause to project
promote someone to a higher rank

word_usage.usage:
raise和rise都可表示“由低向上升高的动作或趋势”，但raise是及物动词，在主动句中其后必须有宾语; rise是不及物动词，后面不直接跟宾语。如：
他举手提问。
误 He rose his hand to ask a question.
正 He raised his hand to ask a question.
raise作动词时有“提高”的意思，但是“提高英语   ”一般用 improve one's English表达，raise one's English 是逐字直译的中式英语。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 抬起; 举起; 使直立

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: What is a problem with the cattle-<highlight>raising</highlight> industry?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 养牛业有什么问题？

examination_example.sentence: They had a small pond where they <highlight>raised</highlight> fish.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们有一个养鱼的小池塘。

examination_example.sentence: We now realize how important family is and how important it is to be near them, especially when you're <highlight>raising</highlight> children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们现在意识到家庭是多么的重要，和他们在一起是多么的重要，尤其是当你抚养孩子的时候。

sense_info_list.en: increase the amount, level, or strength of

examination_example.sentence: Fighting, however, usually involves personal attacks, <highlight>raising</highlight> of voices, and storming out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 战斗，无论如何，通常包括人身攻击、提高声音和怒气冲冲出去。

examination_example.sentence: Her popular 1962 book Silent Spring <highlight>raised</highlight> awareness of the dangers of pollution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她在1962年出版的畅销书《寂静的春天》，提高了人们对污染的有害影响的认识。

sense_info_list.en: lift or move to a higher position or level
sense_info_list.zh: 抬起; 举起; 使直立

examination_example.sentence: “Digital humans” appear life like on the screen because of facial movements: <highlight>raised</highlight> eyebrows, a smile, even a nod.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于扬眉、微笑，甚至点头等面部动作，“数字人类”在屏幕上显得栩栩如生。

examination_example.sentence: Whaley asked the children one day to <highlight>raise</highlight> their hands if they thought they could never be a president.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Whaley让认为自己以后不可能成为总统的孩子举手。

examination_example.sentence: The author <highlight>raises</highlight> three questions in Paragraph 2 mainly to introduce an approach.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者在第2段中提出了三个问题，主要是引出一种方法。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 抬起; 举起; 使直立

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: vt. 筹集；升起；建造；举起；饲养；（raise的过去式和过去分词）
vt. 筹集；升起；建造；举起；饲养；（raise的现在分词）

word_family.mean: v. 举起；把…往上提；使升高；提高；增大；使被听见；使被考虑；使得到讨论；筹集；募集；养育；教养；使复活；解除；把…从窝里赶出；刺激…生成

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 筹钱；筹集资金；筹集款项

sense_info_list.en: collect, levy, or bring together money or resources

examination_example.sentence: The purpose of this activity is to <highlight>raise</highlight> money for a new hospital．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此次活动的目的是为新医院筹款。

examination_example.sentence: The charity <highlight>raises</highlight> money and finds the right medical volunteers to perform the operations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 慈善机构筹集资金，并找到合适的医疗志愿者来进行手术。

examination_example.sentence: Each group had a task to <highlight>raise</highlight> money for the disabled.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个小组都有一项为残疾人筹款的任务。

examination_example.sentence: Although it will cost more money to <highlight>raise</highlight> pigeons, the research center says that it can save time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然养鸽子会花更多的钱，但是研究中心说可以节省时间。

examination_example.sentence: Well, Tony Kepler <highlight>raises</highlight> killer snakes for a living and he loves his job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 托尼·开普勒以养毒蛇为生，他热爱自己的工作。

examination_example.sentence: In fact, to keep a pet can help a young couple have the responsibility to <highlight>raise</highlight> children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实际上养宠物能帮助年轻夫妻培养养育孩子的责任感。

sense_info_list.en: lift or move to a higher position or level
sense_info_list.zh: 抬起; 举起; 使直立

examination_example.sentence: Opening a book or <highlight>raising</highlight> hands, some very easy actions for common people, however, are big challenges for Xu.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 翻开一本书或者抬起手，这些对普通人来说非常简单的动作，然而，对徐克来说却是巨大的挑战。

examination_example.sentence: Usually your teacher can see you <highlight>raise</highlight> your hand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常你的老师能看到你举手。

examination_example.sentence: He saw a rabbit running out of a bush not far in front and quickly <highlight>raised</highlight> his gun to shoot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他看见一只兔子从前面不远处的灌木丛里跑出来，赶紧举起枪射击。

sense_info_list.en: increase the amount, level, or strength of

examination_example.sentence: Keith <highlight>raises</highlight> his voice and says, "What? You mean I'm too old to wear the jacket again?"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基思提高嗓门说:“什么？你是说我太老了，不能再穿夹克了？”

examination_example.sentence: For example, a business could <highlight>raise</highlight> the price of a product according to a person's age and feelings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，企业可以根据一个人的年龄和感受来提高产品的价格。

examination_example.sentence: Of course the public should <highlight>raise</highlight> environmental awareness and realize it is everyone's duty to protect the environment．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，公众应该提高环保意识，认识到保护环境是每个人的责任。

sense_info_list.en: put forward for consideration or discussion

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Raising</highlight> a question
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提出问题

examination_example.sentence: The human body is a machine that can <highlight>raise</highlight> lots of interesting questions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人体是一台能提出许多有趣问题的机器。

examination_example.sentence: But this <highlight>raises</highlight> a question.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这提出了一个问题。

sense_info_list.en: an increase in salary
promote someone to a higher rank

word_usage.usage:
raise和rise都可表示“由低向上升高的动作或趋势”，但raise是及物动词，在主动句中其后必须有宾语; rise是不及物动词，后面不直接跟宾语。如：
他举手提问。
误 He rose his hand to ask a question.
正 He raised his hand to ask a question.
raise作动词时有“提高”的意思，但是“提高英语”一般用 improve one's English表达，raise one's English 是逐字直译的中式英语。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 及物动词，主语通常为人、机构等，既指抬起或举起具体事物，也指提高数量、水平、价格、质量等，常包含人为因素。
不及物动词，主语通常为事物，既指水位、地势等升高，也指数量、价值、地位等提高，通常不包含人为因素。
指用体力或机械将人或事物举起；也指抬起某一身体部位。
常指用体力将某事物抬高或举高；也指抬起眼睛、头或脸以向上看。
指抚养孩子长大；也指饲养动物或种植某种植物。
指照顾、教导孩子直到其成年。
